name: China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd.
description: China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd. is a leading mining company based in Canada, primarily focused on gold and other precious metal production. Established in 2007 as a subsidiary of China National Gold Group, the company operates several mining projects in both Canada and Mongolia. CGAU is committed to sustainable mining practices and employs advanced technologies to enhance production efficiency while minimizing environmental impact. Its flagship assets include the CSH gold mine in Inner Mongolia and the Jiama copper-gold mine in Tibet, which contribute significantly to its output. With a strong emphasis on exploration and development, China Gold International is continuously seeking new opportunities to expand its resource base and improve its operational capabilities. The company aims to leverage its expertise and resources to become a globally recognized player in the mining sector, focusing on operational excellence and sustainable growth.

seo.meta_title: China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd. | Leading Gold Mining Company
seo.meta_description: Explore China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd., a leading mining company focused on gold and precious metal production with operations in Canada and Mongolia.

faq.question: What does China Gold International do?
faq.answer: China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd. focuses on gold and copper mining, operating several mines in Canada and Mongolia.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of China Gold International?
faq.answer: Yin Zhiqiang is the CEO of China Gold International Resources Corp. Ltd.

faq.question: Where is China Gold International headquartered?
faq.answer: China Gold International is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

faq.question: What are the main products of China Gold International?
faq.answer: The main products include gold bars, gold nuggets, and copper concentrate.

faq.question: When was China Gold International founded?
faq.answer: China Gold International was founded in 2007.
